_header: Say to Our Lady aves seven
Subjects: rubrics; devotional verse; illustrations, verse accompanying; Christ, wounds of; crucifixion
_description: A rubric recommending prayer to the Heart of Christ — two couplets

BodLatMisC66.Transcription:
Say to our lady aues seuenThe crede of þe appostelis ffor
                    þe mede of heuenFor his lofe þat ȝou boȝtTo
                    þe naym[?] þat rede can not
BodLatMisC66.Note:
Written below heart illustrating the wounds Christ received on the
                    cross.
